body: @indygreg Could you help us figure out why we're seeing these cloning failures in TaskCluster? We're getting them when just running `hg clone http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/`, and we're using the same workers as the normal TC Firefox builds use.
body_text: @indygreg Could you help us figure out why we're seeing these cloning failures in TaskCluster? We're getting them when just running hg clone http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/, and we're using the same workers as the normal TC Firefox builds use.
